title: Stuffed roast pork loin with honey glaze
ingredients: ['1 loin of pork', '1 packet of sage and onion stuffing mix', '300ml (1/2 pt) boiling water', '1 knob butter (optional)', 'olive oil', 'salt', '4 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons mustard powder', '2 tablespoons demerara sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger']
